Class Researcher

java.lang.Object
Researcher
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, ResearcherM
public class Researcher extends Object implements ResearcherM, Serializable
The Researcher class represents a user in the system with the role of a researcher. It implements the ResearcherM interface, providing methods to work with research projects and papers.
See Also:
